properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
BAY OF BISCAY.
DNC 08.
11 METER S/V PERNILLE, WHITE HULL WITH RED STRIPE,
ONE PERSON ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE DUE TO
ENGINE TROUBLE. LAST KNOWN POSITION 47-22N 005-50W
AT 130600Z AUG. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ETEL, TELEX: 42950519,
PHONE: 332 9755 3535, FAX: 332 9755 4934,
E-MAIL: ETEL@MRCCFR.EU.
